item.description:
Create something unique with everyday items. In this class you will display your jewelry in a unique and eco-friendly way with this original “Bottle Branch Jewelry Holder” or vase or candle stick … your choice.

Decorated Wine Bottle and Branch Jewelry Holder

You will collage a recycled wine bottle (or any glass bottle) using various papers and recycled materials. You can hang your rings, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets from a branch or the mouth of the bottle!

Wine, bottles, papers and glues will be provided. You can bring any 2-D materials or papers you would like to incorporate into the decoupage design. Additional papers and materials are also available for purchase.


***You must register online in order to attend the class. To register, visit http://www.abeille.us...

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Decoupage Bottle Branch ($35)
